generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background and on the sides of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and some bushes are visible along the road and sidewalks.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the sides of the road and one is partially visible in the foreground.
- bus: Two red buses are visible on the road, one in front of the camera and one further ahead.
- traffic sign: A blue traffic sign with a white arrow pointing right is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible above the road, showing red.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
